website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice that works well at both detecting leaks and telling you how severe they are.
pros: Beep alarms and an LED indicator alert you to a leak and show you how severe it is
Very sensitive detection of methane and propane
Comes with a hard carrying case
cons: Arrives with very little in the way of instructions or technical information
Has a 10 minute shutoff, at which point you have to recalibrate it

customer_reviews.title: Was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first 16 months, one of the most helpful tools in my CNG shop, used prob 1 time, maybe 2, per week. But then it began to not beep on occasion. Eventually is was to the point where it made no sound save for the occasional beep. I keep this tool in its original box, clean and protected. I am surprised it failed after such a short time. Amprobe offers zero repair options...only option is to buy a new one. I am going to investigate other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty

customer_reviews.title: com because if you have a problem like I did they handle everything fair and fast
customer_reviews.text: I don’t hesitate to buy on Amazon.com because if you have a problem like I did they handle everything fair and fast! This unit gave me a false reading that cost me a service call. It’s ok because when it comes to gas, safety first. I can’t recommend this because no matter what you pay theses unit they should work properly. I most likely got a bad one out of the bunch!
customer_reviews.author: Lenny P.

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: This guys was spot on to help us detect a tiny LP gas leak after hooking up our clothes dryer. We tried for days with other “spray on liquid” detectors, but still kept smelling a garage full of gas after appliance being on for about 6-8 hrs. This guy sniffed it out in 2 seconds flat. We turned it on outside in the fresh air to calibrate, and it worked awesome! I love how easy it works and how it shows the levels of your leak! I would not hesitate to buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Rainbows

customer_reviews.title: Good detector
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work to detect possible natural gas leaks inside houses. It works very good and as expected. The only drawback is the warmup time for the device seems extremely long. If you don't allow this full time for the ready light to turn green, the device will pickup anything. Once the light turns green it detects flammable gases in very low ppm in the air. I've tested it on regular gas, butane, natural gas, and propane. So far so goo.
customer_reviews.author: Lee R.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Had a small LP leak in our camper connections to the tanks. Water bubbles just wasn't going to work for us to find the small leak. A little pricey for a one time use but better than what could have happened if the leak were not found.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rick

customer_reviews.title: It works fine and does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: It works fine and does what it is supposed to do. Other meters I have used had adjustments for sensitivity; this one does not, but I use it nearly every day in Home Inspections, and have found plenty of leaks, many of them too light to even smell readily, so I guess it is plenty sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: 44Roger

customer_reviews.title: it started beeping like crazy. Vindicated
customer_reviews.text: I kept telling my husband I smelled gas coming from the fireplace and I don't think he believed me because he could never smell it. We ordered this and as soon as he stuck the sensor behind the fireplace cover...it started beeping like crazy. Vindicated! Thank you amprobe!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: It just didnt work. The product itself wasn't new. It's used many times shown by the scratches on the device. We have a gas leak in the neighborhood and this device didnt detect any of it. Maybe i recieved a faulty device but it just didnt detect anything and the little green LED for the gas showed up infrequently
customer_reviews.author: AWS Customer 20

customer_reviews.title: It does detect gas leaks. Don't know how low ...
customer_reviews.text: It does detect gas leaks. Don't know how low, but lowest reading is 40 ppm. At first I thought it was defective cause it took a long time to warm up, or calibrate. Works well and can use AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Novak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clear, finds any leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Found a leak immediately in gas pipe union and I replaced. I scanned my whole house and am now secure that my house is safe. Product even shows how great a leak is in led display. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Leo P.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone who has NG / Propane appliances should have one of these
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these now. They are great for verifying propane / NG fittings and valves. The probe does take about 10 seconds to warm up before you can use it. Way more convenient than soapy water (which I found can cause corrosion if not rinsed off you fittings).
customer_reviews.author: G.G.S.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.  Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described and has already saved more money than it cost. Easy to use by the homeowner and rugged enough for the professional. Comes with a study case.
customer_reviews.author: IGP

customer_reviews.title: worked and is very sensitive. picked up very small ...
customer_reviews.text: worked and is very sensitive. picked up very small amount. called gas company and their unit found what mine picked up was very very small amount
customer_reviews.author: FJA

customer_reviews.title: Great HVAC tool
customer_reviews.text: This gas leak detector excels in performance. Unlike others in price range, Amprobe has audible alarm and led numerical indicator to see the amount of leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had a minute gas leak on my stove and ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a minute gas leak on my stove and I couldn't find it with soapy water. I purchased the GSD600 gas leak detector and found the lead in a very short time. After I found the leak, I sprayed the fitting with the same product used by PG&E our local gas provider and still showed no leaks. This unit will detect leaks that I couldn't find with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great..
customer_reviews.text: Works great......no gas leaks found yet. Tested with natural and propane gas intentional leaks and it worked great. For the DIY homeowner (me), usage might be infrequent but when needed, it is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kapl

customer_reviews.title: Found a difficult leak
customer_reviews.text: We could smell propane in our basement and had the supply company come out and inspect. They found nothing. I purchased this sniffer and was able to find the leak outside of the house and it was finding its way in . It takes a while to work, 30s, once turned on, but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Alprazo

customer_reviews.title: Nice, managed to pinpoint the source of gas leak
customer_reviews.text: Nice, managed to pinpoint the source of gas leak. Bubble test did not show anything, looked like now leaks at all but managed to find couple using this detector. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: batta

customer_reviews.title: As sensitive as it gets.
customer_reviews.text: Very sensitive so you will find what most are missing. I have over 500 leaks detected using bubble up products and over 35 with this in a very short time.
customer_reviews.author: Faultfinders®

customer_reviews.title: It was a easy find with this Gas leak detector
customer_reviews.text: This gas detector works well. We have multiple propane tanks and could not find where a leak was coming from. Turns out one regulator was venting when the sun heated up the tank. It was a easy find with this Gas leak detector.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Just a few more cents of plastic to make the cases thicker and the cover of the probe better would add tremendous value to this meter
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased two of these gas detectors, They both function as described The only downsides are the long warm up period and the very light weight construction. Just a few more cents of plastic to make the cases thicker and the cover of the probe better would add tremendous value to this meter. Get rid of your value engineer. His gone overboard
customer_reviews.author: Mike Riddell

customer_reviews.title: Not an expert at all
customer_reviews.text: But it is really easy to use, I have a plumber redo the natural gas pipe. I check for leak everyday afterward. So far, it is very accurate (as far as I can tell).
customer_reviews.author: I_HATE_THIS

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because we kept smelling gas. Received item quickly. Found the gas problem immediately. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saving meter.
customer_reviews.text: Helped find a gas leak in my natural gas manifole the first day I used it. Leak was close to a light switch too.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J Morris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Long enough to reach behind stove and gas line in ceiling in basement.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marbut

customer_reviews.title: so far Amprobe gives me the best result.
customer_reviews.text: I had used many gas leak detector; so far Amprobe gives me the best result.
customer_reviews.author: Xing Fang

customer_reviews.title: Ceased operation
customer_reviews.text: What is the lifetime of this device? Mine stopped working after a few uses. Kept beeping and missed a leak.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Francois Caubet

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gas leak detector
customer_reviews.text: A little different than I'm used to since this detector doesn't seem to pump air but it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave904

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. It detected my dryer gas leak so we could fix it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Online-shopper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: why I need to plug in the headset to hear the alert..
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used several gas detectors but this product is accurate & reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cooper

customer_reviews.title: probe is easy to direct to suspect connections
customer_reviews.text: Uses batteries so does not have to be recharged, accurate, relative inexpensive, probe is easy to direct to suspect connections, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pease

customer_reviews.title: Works Great Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: Works great, It found a serious problem and I am very greatful
customer_reviews.author: Quickdraw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this leak detector. Use it far more than I thought I would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: very happy with item works great every time I use it and very easy to use it and great price for a gas leak detector
customer_reviews.author: Troy Towell

customer_reviews.title: It works well detecting gas leaks
customer_reviews.text: The gas leak detector works pretty well. I like it and would buy it again. The case is very good and protect well the detector.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great I'm a home inspector Finds leaks you cannot smell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Built and VERY Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality electronic device backed by a respected American company. It performed exactly as described, is EXTREMELY sensitive, and will help locate the tiniest leaks. It can detect propane starting at only 35 ppm (parts per million), which is LONG before a human nose at about 400 ppm.
customer_reviews.author: Gyropilot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This device works very well for its described purpose, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Good detector
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, was surprised at the sensitivity of the meter. I would definitely recommend this meter to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this detector
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this detector, the first day when I received it I decided to test it out and found a small gas leak in my own house by my furnace. definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend if we have an RV it cant save your ...
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend if we have an RV it cant save your life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This worked for me to track down a small leak ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked for me to track down a small leak near our gas meter where some nuts had not been tightened sufficiently when the gas company serviced it recently.
customer_reviews.author: James Koch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This leak detector is very accurate an I will buy it over again.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no calibration like the old days, just power on and it does the rest.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stalter

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value for the money. Great price range . Even sniffs methane gas during lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Ross VCU

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great, Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: Found several leaks in my old gas piping immediately, this unit is very sensitive and works well. I like the adjustable snake that allows access behind equipment. Seems pretty well built though is made in China, but what isnt?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: fair to pick up gas had to be right on top to find gas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it does take a full minute to 'warm up' - but, beyond that, it does the job very well. It appears to be well made and it has a case to store it in. I did my research on detectors and this one was well worth the money for it's quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tool to find tiny gas leaks
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable and accurate , just point the sensor head at the suspected pipe joint , it will sound and flash the amount of gas leakage if any . Bubbles itself is not going to help if you cannot see all around the connection . This unit is a great tool to find where the smell of gas comes from , thank you amazon , thank you Amprobe
customer_reviews.author: S.B.G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It worked well. Easy to use. Detected small leaks. Just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: George Ezzard

customer_reviews.title: Propane and farts... good to go
customer_reviews.text: It worked great to quickly sniff leaks of propane.... and yes detects farts... the kid within made me do it ;-o
customer_reviews.author: Bcapollo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems to work. I have used it once so far.
customer_reviews.author: ronald m.

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap in the hand
customer_reviews.text: In fairness, I haven't even used the detector yet. However, tool quality and feel are important to me, and at first blush both are lacking. The case seems reasonably sturdy, but the tool itself feels flimsy and rattle-trappy. Both smell strongly of Chineseum. Time will tell...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Found a gas leak in the distribution valve ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Found a gas leak in the distribution valve of our gas stove... Replaced the valve and the gas smell (and leak) is gone.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Not as posted
customer_reviews.text: Does not detect natural gas. Stated to detect combustible gas but does not detect natural gas . Should state that on the web site!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Found leaks I never knew I had.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and storage case a big plus to protect it between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Midgett

product_meta.title: Amprobe GSD600 Gas Leak Detector
product_meta.description: Amprobe products range from an extensive line of clamp meters and digital multimeters to industry-specific tools for residential/commercial electricians, HVAC/R technicians, utilities and industrial maintenance professionals. All Amprobe tools undergo rigorous testing to ensure full compliance with the latest IEC and CE safety regulations in Fluke Safety labs for quality and safety you can trust.
feature_bullets: Detects leaking gas in closed piping systems
Flexible stainless steel probe provides access to hard-to-reach areas
Audible buzzer and a display panel with light-emitting diodes (LEDs) indicate presence and concentration of detected gas
Automatic calibration at start-up helps ensure accuracy
Semiconductor sensor detects methane and propane .Response time: less than 10 seconds Warm up time: less than 60 seconds

specifications.Measurement Accuracy: Methane: 40 to 640 ppm, Propane: 35 to 580 ppm
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars108 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
